meanings.definition: To press the wrong key on a keyboard while typing.
meanings.sent1: She often miskeys the password when logging in.
meanings.sent2: He miskeys his email address and wonders why he doesn't receive replies.
meanings.sent3: In a rush, she miskeys the address and sends the package to the wrong house.
meanings.sent4: The detective miskeys a crucial clue, leading to a wrong suspect.
meanings.sent5: Miskeying the code can lock you out of the system permanently.

meanings.definition: The act of making a mistake while typing on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: His frequent miskeys often result in typos in his reports.
meanings.sent2: The miskeys in the document made it difficult to read.
meanings.sent3: The comedy of errors began with a miskey in the script.
meanings.sent4: Her miskeys were like musical notes out of tune in the composition.
meanings.sent5: The miskeys stood out like sore thumbs in the final draft.
